commonQuestions.question: There are so many channels, where do I start?
commonQuestions.answer:
Start with just 2-3 channels based on your role:
‚Ä¢ **Everyone**: #start-here, #general-automation
‚Ä¢ **Freelancers**: Add #hire-me
‚Ä¢ **Clients**: Add #job-board
‚Ä¢ **Learners**: Add #beginner-help

commonQuestions.question: What are all these commands for?
commonQuestions.answer: You only need `/help` to start! It will guide you to other commands as needed. Most features are discoverable naturally through conversations.

commonQuestions.question: How do I know what role I should have?
commonQuestions.answer: Run `/onboarding-status` - it will show your current role and suggest changes if needed. You can also use `/re-onboard` to update your preferences.

commonQuestions.question: Is it okay to just lurk at first?
commonQuestions.answer: Absolutely! Many members start by reading and learning. Post when you feel comfortable - the community is welcoming to all experience levels.
